translation.en: [commentator 1] Across every continent on the face of the globe,
translation.zh: 横跨地球上的每一块大陆

translation.en: to every lover of the game wherever you are…
translation.zh:
献给每一位热爱这项运动的人
无论你身在何处

translation.en: [commentator 2 in French] …133rd game…
translation.zh: …第133场比赛…

translation.en: [commentator 1 in English] …whatever time of day or night…
translation.zh: 不管白天黑夜

translation.en: welcome.
translation.zh: 欢迎你们

translation.en: It is now that we establish
translation.zh:
（2022年12月18日
世界杯总决赛） 现在我们将决定

translation.en: which, of Argentina and France, will become the owners, for four years,
translation.zh: 四年之后 阿根廷队和法国队

translation.en: of that most famous piece of gold.
translation.zh: 谁将成为大力神杯的主人

translation.en: [coach in French] Nothing is going to stop us today.
translation.zh:
（卢赛尔体育场
卡塔尔 卢赛尔） 今天没有什么能阻止我们

translation.en: Let's play our game! Give everything you've got!
translation.zh: 我们好好比赛！竭尽全力！

translation.en: Let's get that third star!
translation.zh: 让我们第三次当上冠军！

translation.en: [commentator 1 in English] That is the World Cup.
translation.zh: 这就是世界杯

translation.en: Lionel Messi stares up at his final peak.
translation.zh:
莱昂内尔·梅西凝视着
他的最后一个巅峰挑战

translation.en: Kylian Mbappé prowls in the foothills of greatness.
translation.zh:
基利安·姆巴佩
步入最伟大球星的行列

translation.en: From the Andes to the Alps,
translation.zh: 从安第斯山脉到阿尔卑斯山

translation.en: from River Plate to the banks of the Seine,
translation.zh: 从普拉特河到塞纳河畔

translation.en: our planet unites around its ultimate game.
translation.zh: 全球人民因为这场终极比赛欢聚一堂

translation.en: The time is nigh.
translation.zh: 比赛即将开始

translation.en: [in Spanish] The World Cup has that special something.
translation.zh: 世界杯有一些特别的东西

translation.en: It hits you deeply and it stirs up deep emotions.
translation.zh:
它能深深地触动你
激起你深层的情感

translation.en: [Laurens in English] The World Cup is always amazing.
translation.zh: 世界杯总是令人惊叹

translation.en: Every country has their own stories, every player has their own narrative.
translation.zh:
每个国家都有自己的故事
每个球员都有自己的经历

translation.en: [in French] The World Cup is simply the greatest competition.
translation.zh: 世界杯是最伟大的比赛

translation.en: Now, all behind the Blues.
translation.zh: 现在 都在蓝军法国队之后

translation.en: [Mbappé] Messi and Cristiano, they're better players than me.
translation.zh: 梅西和C罗 他们是比我更好的球员

translation.en: But I tell myself I'm the best.
translation.zh: 但我告诉自己我是最棒的

translation.en: [commentator] Kylian Mbappé!
translation.zh: 基利安·姆巴佩！

translation.en: [Messi in Spanish] It's my last chance to achieve my greatest dream.
translation.zh: 这是实现我最大梦想的最后机会

translation.en: But this is a World Cup and it's really tough.
translation.zh: 但这是世界杯 比赛真的很艰难

translation.en: We destroyed you, loser! [bleep]
translation.zh: 我们打败了你 手下败将！

translation.en: [Ronaldo in Portuguese] Some people like me, some people don't.
translation.zh: 有些人喜欢我 有些人不喜欢

translation.en: But I'm proud of everything I've done.
translation.zh: 但我为我所做的一切感到骄傲

translation.en: It wouldn't be fair to ask for more.
translation.zh: 再要求更多就有失公平了

translation.en: [Busquets in Spanish] Spain are at a point of generational change…
translation.zh: 西班牙正处于代际更迭的时刻

translation.en: …with a very young team.
translation.zh: 这是一个非常年轻的团队

translation.en: Nice one!
translation.zh: 漂亮！

translation.en: -One, two, three! -[all] Win, win, win!
translation.zh:
-一、二、三！
-赢球！

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.zh: 上场！

translation.en: [Silva in Portuguese] We're the Brazilian squad.
translation.zh: 我们是巴西队

translation.en: We're important.
translation.zh: 我们是强队

translation.en: Whether you like it or not, it brings a lot of pressure.
translation.zh:
不管你喜不喜欢
这都会给你带来很大的压力

translation.en: If you lose in Brazil, they kill you.
translation.zh: 如果你在巴西输了 他们会杀了你

translation.en: [Kane in English] The World Cup is the highest pressure tournament you'll play.
translation.zh: 世界杯是你将参加的压力最大的比赛

translation.en: The hype around the game…
translation.zh: 比赛的热度…

translation.en: Go and win this fucking game. Come on!
translation.zh: 去拿下这场比赛 加油！

translation.en: [Kane] The rivalries amongst the teams.
translation.zh: 各队之间的竞争

translation.en: [Bale] You have the best team from South America, North America,
translation.zh: 这里汇聚了南美洲、北美洲

translation.en: Asia, Africa.
translation.zh: 亚洲、非洲最棒的球队

translation.en: [Martinez in Spanish] The World Cup is madness.
translation.zh: 世界杯是疯狂的

translation.en: It's madness, it's irrational.
translation.zh: 非常疯狂 没有理性

translation.en: This passion is very hard to explain.
translation.zh: 这种激情很难解释

translation.en: [in French] We know we can do something historic.
translation.zh: 我们知道我们可以创造历史

translation.en: We want to keep making people dream.
translation.zh: 我们想让人们继续梦想

translation.en: [Yoshida in Japanese] It was a reminder that one mistake
translation.zh: 这提醒我们在世界杯上犯一个错

translation.en: can make a big difference at the World Cup.
translation.zh: 结果就可能会大相径庭

translation.en: [Adams in English] Going into a World Cup, you know that
translation.zh: 参加世界杯 你知道

translation.en: one team leaves the World Cup happy.
translation.zh: 将有一支球队满意地离开

translation.en: If we have to drag you off that pitch, we will.
translation.zh:
如果我们必须把你从球场上拖下来
我们会的

translation.en: [in Japanese] We're going to fight again! Let's win, come on!
translation.zh:
让我们再次战斗吧！
让我们赢得比赛 加油！

translation.en: [Adams in English] Four teams in a group.
translation.zh: （小组赛） 四队一组 小组前两名出线

translation.en: The top two teams make it out of the group.
translation.zh: 四队一组 小组前两名出线

translation.en: -Get over here! -We ain't going, skip!
translation.zh:
-过来！
-我们不去 省省吧！

translation.en: -[in Croatian] Above all… -Croatia!
translation.zh:
-尤其…
-克罗地亚！

translation.en: [Adams in English] You don't wanna be stuck in the bottom two or else your journey's over.
translation.zh:
你不想成为倒数两名
否则你的旅程就结束了

translation.en: Every game from that point to the final is win or go home.
translation.zh:
从那时起直到决赛的每一场比赛
要么赢 要么回家

translation.en: [in Portuguese] Everybody wants to win.
translation.zh: 人人都想赢

translation.en: But there can only be one winner.
translation.zh: 但冠军只有一个

translation.en: [in English] This World Cup is the end of an era.
translation.zh: 本届世界杯标志着一个时代的结束

translation.en: For so many players, it's their last chance to win the ultimate prize.
translation.zh:
对于很多球员来说
这是他们赢得终极大奖的最后机会

translation.en: [in Portuguese] It's life or death.
translation.zh: 生死攸关

translation.en: ♪ In '94, Romário ♪
translation.zh: 1994年 罗马里奥

translation.en: ♪ In 2002, Fenomeno ♪
translation.zh: 2002年 罗纳尔多

translation.en: ♪ First to be five-time champion ♪
translation.zh: 第一个五次获得冠军的球队

translation.en: [Silva in Portuguese] The atmosphere is extremely good.
translation.zh: 气氛非常好

translation.en: The mix of young and experienced players makes for better relationships.
translation.zh:
年轻球员和经验丰富的球员的混合
使球队的关系更好

translation.en: We try to have fun. We try to be happy.
translation.zh: 我们想要开心 我们想要快乐

translation.en: I want them to be happy.
translation.zh: 我希望他们开心

translation.en: I am proud to be part of the Brazilian team.
translation.zh: 我很自豪能成为巴西队的一员 （巴西队队长 席尔瓦）

translation.en: [Bueno] Thiago Silva is a great player.
translation.zh: 蒂亚戈·席尔瓦是位伟大的球员

translation.en: He's a leader. He displays the right conduct on and off the pitch.
translation.zh:
他是一位领袖
他在场上和场下都表现得很好 （传奇评论员 加尔沃·布埃诺）

translation.en: Thiago Silva…
translation.zh: 蒂亚戈·席尔瓦…

translation.en: [in French] I think he's one of the most professional players I've seen in my career.
translation.zh:
我认为他是我职业生涯中见过的
最专业的球员之一

translation.en: [in Danish] He's one of the most complete defenders around.
translation.zh: 他是最全面的防守球员之一

translation.en: [in Portuguese] Nice, bro!
translation.zh: 不错 兄弟！

translation.en: [Bueno] He's had a distinguished career.
translation.zh: 他的职业生涯很杰出

translation.en: [Silva] I'm one of the most successful players in world football.
translation.zh: 我是世界足坛最成功的球员之一

translation.en: But…
translation.zh: 但是

translation.en: the World Cup is the one I want to win.
translation.zh: 我想赢得世界杯的冠军

translation.en: Man, it's one of my biggest dreams.
translation.zh: 伙计 这是我最大的梦想之一

translation.en: [commentator in English] Neymar's corner…
translation.zh: 内马尔的角球…

translation.en: Brilliant header, Thiago Silva!
translation.zh: 蒂亚戈·席尔瓦精彩的头球！

translation.en: Brazil is Brazil,
translation.zh: 巴西队就是巴西队

translation.en: and if you speak about the World Cup,
translation.zh: 如果你谈到世界杯

translation.en: the first team that will come to everyone's mind is Brazil,
translation.zh: 每个人首先想到的是巴西队

translation.en: because they always bring talent and special qualities
translation.zh: 因为他们总是在世界杯上展现出

translation.en: to a World Cup that everyone wants to see.
translation.zh: 人人都想看到的天赋跟特别的球技

translation.en: [Adams] Neymar is one of the best ever.
translation.zh: 内马尔是有史以来最好的球员之一

translation.en: [in Portuguese] It's wrong!
translation.zh: 这是错的！ （内马尔）

translation.en: [in English] Lot of Brazil's performances are judged off of how he performs.
translation.zh:
很多时候 巴西队的表现
都取决于他的表现

translation.en: People say if he plays bad, then they won't win,
translation.zh:
人们说如果他踢得不好
他们就赢不了

translation.en: and if he plays good then they obviously have a greater chance of winning.
translation.zh:
如果他踢得好
那么他们显然获胜机会更大

translation.en: [Silva in Portuguese] Neymar is such good fun, man.
translation.zh: 内马尔太有趣了 伙计

translation.en: Who's after you?
translation.zh: 谁在你身后？

translation.en: We talk to each other every day.
translation.zh: 我们每天都聊天

translation.en: All good?
translation.zh: 一切都好吗？

translation.en: And we started to create a nice relationship, you know?
translation.zh: 然后我们的关系开始变好

translation.en: Mutual respect, recognition and affection.
translation.zh: 相互尊重、认可和喜爱

translation.en: He's also older like me… At least I'm not the only one.
translation.zh:
他跟我一样是老球员…
至少我不是唯一一个

translation.en: [Adams in English] Brazil, the expectation of going into World Cup is that you have to win.
translation.zh:
人们对于巴西队参加世界杯的期望
就是必须要赢

translation.en: Everything you do will be a failure unless you're holding the trophy at the end.
translation.zh:
除非你最后能举起奖杯
不然你所做的一切都是失败的

translation.en: [journalist in Portuguese] Are you anxious?
translation.zh: 你焦虑吗？

translation.en: [chuckling] No, not at all! Being anxious, it's normal.
translation.zh: 不 一点儿都不！焦虑是正常的

translation.en: I always get a bit anxious when things are fast approaching.
translation.zh: 事情快发生的时候 我总是有点焦虑

translation.en: Today, at the press conference, the first guy…
translation.zh:
今天的新闻发布会上
第一个提问的人…

translation.en: The question was almost like an attack.
translation.zh: 那个问题几乎像是一种攻击

translation.en: Trying to bring me down at a critical time for Brazil.
translation.zh: 想在巴西队的关键时刻让我沮丧

translation.en: [journalist] Thiago first.
translation.zh: 蒂亚戈先来回答

translation.en: Thiago, what does it mean for you to be captain of the national team again?
translation.zh:
蒂亚戈 再次担任国家队队长
对你来说意味着什么？

translation.en: Do you feel emotionally ready?
translation.zh: 你在情感上准备好了吗？

translation.en: [Silva] People say that, "Thiago is weak…
translation.zh: 人们说：“蒂亚戈有情绪

translation.en: for having emotions."
translation.zh: 是很软弱的”

translation.en: I wouldn't have got to where I am today by being mentally weak.
translation.zh:
如果我精神软弱
我就不会有今天的成就

translation.en: Man, I had to be strong in one of the biggest battles of my life.
translation.zh:
伙计 我必须在我人生中
最重要的一场战斗中坚强起来 （俄罗斯 莫斯科）

translation.en: I left Brazil when I was really young.
translation.zh: 我在很年轻的时候就离开了巴西

translation.en: And from there, I had the opportunity to transfer to Dynamo Moscow.
translation.zh:
那之后 我有机会转会到
莫斯科迪纳摩

translation.en: I trained and trained with a really painful chest.
translation.zh: 我不停训练 胸口真的很疼

translation.en: I didn't know what was really going on.
translation.zh: 我不知道到底发生了什么

translation.en: I was almost dying, man.
translation.zh: 我快死掉了 伙计

translation.en: INSTITUTE OF EMERGENCY CARE
translation.zh: （急诊室）

translation.en: The doctor held the X-ray up to the light
translation.zh: 医生把X光片举到灯光下

translation.en: and you could see that there was a huge hole in my lung.
translation.zh: 你可以看到我的肺有一个大洞

translation.en: If we had waited any longer for the diagnosis, there would be no cure.
translation.zh:
如果我们再延误诊断时间的话
就没有治愈的办法了

translation.en: [Isabelle] The thoughts that he had… "I'll probably need surgery."
translation.zh: 他的想法是“我可能需要手术”

translation.en: "I might not play again."
translation.zh: “我可能不能踢球了”

translation.en: It was his whole career. Everything he ever dreamt of.
translation.zh:
那是他的整个职业生涯
他梦想的一切 （蒂亚戈的妻子
伊莎贝尔达席尔瓦）

translation.en: I spent six months in the hospital, you know?
translation.zh: 我在医院住了六个月

translation.en: I was alone.
translation.zh: 我很孤独

translation.en: It's awful being away from home when your family is in Brazil.
translation.zh:
当你的家人在巴西时
离开家的感觉很糟糕

translation.en: Going through tuberculosis
translation.zh: 经历过肺结核

translation.en: left me with scars that will never heal.
translation.zh: 给我留下了永远无法愈合的伤疤

translation.en: When people say that I won a lot of trophies,
translation.zh: 当人们说我赢得了很多奖杯时

translation.en: the biggest achievement of my life that I'm most proud of
translation.zh: 我一生中引以为傲的最大成就

translation.en: was overcoming tuberculosis.
translation.zh: 就是战胜了肺结核

translation.en: Man, I think all this comes from the press.
translation.zh: 伙计 我觉得这一切都是媒体说的

translation.en: I'm always prepared for every situation.
translation.zh: 我总是为各种情况做好准备

translation.en: It's a special moment.
translation.zh: 这是一个特殊的时刻

translation.en: I appreciate the trust from the coach
translation.zh: 我很感谢教练的信任

translation.en: to be given the captaincy.
translation.zh: 让我来担任队长

translation.en: To beat me, you have to be stronger than me.
translation.zh: 要打败我 你得比我强

translation.en: And that's tough.
translation.zh: 这很困难

translation.en: [commentator in English] Planet football invites seduction by Brazil.
translation.zh: 巴西足球吸引着世界足坛的目光

translation.en: No group of players carries a greater burden.
translation.zh: 没有任何一组球员承担着更大的负担

translation.en: No group is fueled by a greater privilege
translation.zh: 更强烈的荣誉感

translation.en: than those in the shimmering shirts of canary yellow.
translation.zh:
激励着身着闪亮鲜黄色球衣的
巴西球员

translation.en: [Silva in Portuguese] You are representing an entire country when you wear the captain's armband,
translation.zh:
佩戴队长袖标
听起来可能没什么了不起

translation.en: which might not sound like much.
translation.zh: 但你代表着整个国家

translation.en: But the whole country is here. They're well-represented.
translation.zh:
整个国家就在这里
得到充分的体现

translation.en: [commentator in English] Now Neymar--
translation.zh: 现在内马尔…

translation.en: Instantly surrounded and bruised.
translation.zh: 立即被包围了 伤痕累累

translation.en: Here's Brazil's corner, which is punched up over his own crossbar.
translation.zh:
巴西队开出角球
被对方守门员脱出横梁

translation.en: Júnior!
translation.zh: 儒尼奥尔！

translation.en: Half-time.
translation.zh: 中场休息

translation.en: [commentator] Alex Sandro!
translation.zh: 阿莱士·桑德罗！

translation.en: Neymar.
translation.zh: 内马尔

translation.en: It's not happened for him, has it? Been a bit off.
translation.zh:
他没有这样过 对吧？
他有点不在状态

translation.en: Neymar turning on.
translation.zh: 内马尔发起进攻

translation.en: Bundled in, Richarlison!
translation.zh: 球进了 理查利森！

translation.en: For Brazil!
translation.zh: 巴西队得分！

translation.en: [commentator 1 in English] Trying to hold onto this lead… Vinícius Júnior.
translation.zh:
想要扩大领先优势…
维尼修斯·儒尼奥尔

translation.en: And finding Richarlison!
translation.zh: 传球找到理查利森！

translation.en: [commentator 2 in Spanish] He spins! Look at that goal!
translation.zh: 他转身射门！看那个进球！

translation.en: [commentator 1 in English] Now that, that is Brazil!
translation.zh: 那才是真正的巴西队！ （@理查利森 昨天的比赛）

translation.en: [Richarlison in Portuguese] I watched all the videos.
translation.zh: 我看了所有视频

translation.en: It's insane, right? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 难以置信 对吗？

translation.en: I spent days thinking about it,
translation.zh: 我想了好几天

translation.en: and I can't believe it.
translation.zh: 我无法相信

translation.en: Man, that was me!
translation.zh: 天啊 那是我！

translation.en: [commentator 1 in English] Neymar has taken another heavy hit.
translation.zh: 内马尔再次遭受重创

translation.en: [Silva in Portuguese] We looked and said, "What is happening?"
translation.zh:
我们看到 然后说
“发生什么事了？”

translation.en: Another injury.
translation.zh: 再次受伤

translation.en: [commentator 1 in English] And he has been here before.
translation.zh: （终场 巴西2-0塞尔维亚） 他之前也遇到过这种事

translation.en: [in Portuguese] In 2014…
[commentator in English] Neymar shoved over.
translation.zh: 内马尔被撞倒

translation.en: The medical staff for Brazil are signaling frantically towards the technical area.
translation.zh:
巴西队的医务人员
正疯狂地向技术区示意

translation.en: [in Portuguese] We lost Neymar.
translation.zh: 我们失去了内马尔

translation.en: It was a major blow in terms of mentality
translation.zh: 这对我们的心态是一个很大的打击

translation.en: when you've lost your star player,
translation.zh: 失去一个能在球场上解决一切的

translation.en: the guy who solves all the problems for you in games.
translation.zh: 明星球员

translation.en: The guy who causes all the problems for the opposition.
translation.zh: 那个给对手制造麻烦的家伙

translation.en: It took its toll on the team.
translation.zh: 这给球队带来了损失

translation.en: [in Spanish] There's a lot of concern with Neymar's situation.
translation.zh: 人们很担忧内马尔的情况

translation.en: Is it all over for him?
translation.zh: 他无法继续参赛了吗？

translation.en: The Brazilian Football Confederation has been silent on the subject.
translation.zh: 巴西足协对此保持沉默

translation.en: We're still waiting to see what happens next with Neymar.
translation.zh: 我们还在等着看内马尔接下来会怎样

translation.en: [reporter in Portuguese] Who's the favorite to replace him?
translation.zh: 谁最有可能取代他？

translation.en: All moments like this are of huge importance during a campaign.
translation.zh:
所有这样的时刻在比赛中
都是非常重要的

translation.en: He came to the tournament with injuries. Now he's twisted his ankle.
translation.zh:
他带着伤病来参加比赛
现在他扭伤了脚踝

translation.en: [Lineker in English] The thing about World Cups
translation.zh: 在世界杯上

translation.en: is that it's very easy for things to go wrong.
translation.zh: 很容易出问题

translation.en: You need your best players to stay fit.
translation.zh: 你需要最好的球员保持状态

translation.en: If Wales lose Bale, England lost Kane…
translation.zh:
如果威尔士失去了贝尔
英格兰失去了凯恩…

translation.en: If Argentina lost Messi, it could kill you.
translation.zh: 如果阿根廷失去梅西 那会是致命的

translation.en: -[producer] Ready? Okay. -Sí.
translation.zh:
-准备好了吗？好的
-是的

translation.en: [Messi in Spanish] World Cups are so difficult. Anything can happen.
translation.zh:
世界杯太难了
任何事情都有可能发生 （阿根廷队长
莱昂内尔·梅西）

translation.en: When we talk about World Cup favorites,
translation.zh:
（阿根廷队长
莱昂内尔·梅西） 当我们谈论世界杯最喜爱的球队时

translation.en: I think Brazil, France and England
translation.zh: 我想巴西、法国和英格兰

translation.en: are a bit stronger than the rest right now.
translation.zh: 现在比其他队强一点

translation.en: [in French] Which team keeps me up at night? All three of them.
translation.zh:
（塞内加尔队长 库利巴利） 哪支球队让我夜不能寐？
三支都是

translation.en: [in Portuguese] I worry about all of them.
translation.zh: 它们全都让我担心

translation.en: [Fàbregas in English] France will have a lot to say in this World Cup.
translation.zh: 在本届世界杯上 法国队实力雄厚

translation.en: They have the experience of winning it already.
translation.zh: 他们已经赢得过冠军

translation.en: [Deschamps in French] It's a fact.
translation.zh: 这是事实

translation.en: We are the world champions.
translation.zh: 我们是世界冠军 （法国主教练 迪迪埃·德尚）

translation.en: [in French] We're still a competitive team
translation.zh: 我们仍然是一支有竞争力的球队… （法国队长 雨果·洛里斯）

translation.en: with lots of young, talented players.
translation.zh: …有很多年轻、有天赋的球员

translation.en: [in English] I really like England's team.
translation.zh: 我真的很喜欢英格兰队

translation.en: They have a very young, exciting generation.
translation.zh: 他们有非常年轻、令人兴奋的一代

translation.en: [Kane] A lot of us here are used to the hype around the national team.
translation.zh:
我们这里的很多人
都习惯了对国家队的大肆宣传

translation.en: Gotta want this, boys. [bleep]
translation.zh: 得想要这个 伙计们

translation.en: Come on then! Come on!
translation.zh: 那加油吧！加油！

translation.en: -Come on! -Come on!
translation.zh:
-加油！
-加油！

translation.en: We're level-headed, we know what we need to do
translation.zh:
我们头脑冷静
我们知道想要在比赛中走得远

translation.en: to go far in this tournament.
translation.zh: 我们需要做什么

translation.en: [in Danish] Argentina I see as… Perhaps favorites.
translation.zh: 我认为阿根廷也许是最受欢迎的球队 （丹麦队长 西蒙·凯尔）

translation.en: [Laurens in English] Argentina haven't won the World Cup since 1986,
translation.zh:
阿根廷队自1986年以来
就没有赢得过世界杯 在那次大赛中…

translation.en: and in that tournament,
translation.zh: 在那次大赛中…

translation.en: it was lit up by the genius of Diego Maradona.
translation.zh: （法国记者 朱利安·劳伦斯） …马拉多纳的天才表现让人眼前一亮

translation.en: [commentator in Spanish] The most extraordinary goal in the history of the World Cup!
translation.zh: 这是世界杯历史上最不寻常的进球！

translation.en: Diego Armando Maradona!
translation.zh: 迭戈·阿曼多·马拉多纳！

translation.en: [Laurens in English] In 2020, tragedy struck…
translation.zh: 2020年 悲剧发生了…

translation.en: [all chanting] Argentina! Argentina!
translation.zh: 阿根廷

translation.en: [in Spanish] Diego has passed…
translation.zh: 迭戈去世了…

translation.en: due to a cardiac arrest.
translation.zh: 因为心脏骤停

translation.en: It's shocking. Truly shocking.
translation.zh: 令人震惊 真的令人震惊

translation.en: DIEGO MARADONA DIES
translation.zh: （迭戈·马拉多纳去世）

translation.en: -To be honest… -[sighs]
translation.zh: 老实说…

translation.en: It's really weird not having him here, not seeing him in the stands,
translation.zh:
这感觉很奇怪
他不在这里 不在观众席上

translation.en: not seeing people going crazy when he shows up.
translation.zh: 看不到人们因他出现而疯狂

translation.en: He made everyone feel something special.
translation.zh: 他让每个人都觉得很特别

translation.en: It will be strange not to see him at such an important tournament.
translation.zh:
在如此重要的比赛中
看不到他会很奇怪

translation.en: People have always compared Messi with Maradona.
translation.zh: 人们总是拿梅西和马拉多纳做比较 （阿根廷记者 索非亚·马丁内斯）

translation.en: Maradona had a very strong personality on and off the pitch.
translation.zh: 马拉多纳在球场内外的个性都很强

translation.en: Messi was more shy.
translation.zh: 梅西则比较腼腆

translation.en: [commentator] Götze!
translation.zh: 格策！

translation.en: [in English] Germany are the champions of the world!
translation.zh: 德国是世界冠军！

translation.en: For Argentina, the wait goes painfully on.
translation.zh: 对阿根廷来说 痛苦的等待还在继续

translation.en: [man in Spanish] He doesn't have the balls. He is soulless.
translation.zh: 他没有胆量 他没有灵魂 我一直支持他 但够了

translation.en: I've always supported him, but it's enough.
translation.zh: 我一直支持他 但够了

translation.en: Enough already! He's a fraud, a lie.
translation.zh: 已经够了！他是个骗子 一个谎言

translation.en: He has no passion, he walks on the pitch.
translation.zh: 他毫无激情 他在球场上散步

translation.en: You can't compare him to Maradona.
translation.zh: 你不能拿他和马拉多纳相比

translation.en: It's true that there was a lot of criticism.
translation.zh: 确实有很多批评

translation.en: Many people didn't support Messi.
translation.zh: （世界杯决赛上阿根廷的心碎） 很多人不支持梅西

translation.en: Argentina is a very passionate country.
translation.zh: （梅西在决赛中默默无闻） 阿根廷是一个充满激情的国家 （西班牙队长 布斯克茨）

translation.en: We know all the baggage he had to carry.
translation.zh: （梅西仍然在马拉多纳的阴影下） 我们知道他背负了多少包袱

translation.en: When you don't win,
translation.zh: 当你没赢时… （2016年）

translation.en: everyone may blame you.
translation.zh: …所有人都会怪你

translation.en: [commentator in English] Lionel Messi…
translation.zh: 莱昂内尔·梅西…

translation.en: -And he's missed it! -[crowd cheering]
translation.zh: 他没踢进！

translation.en: More shoot-out agony for Argentina.
translation.zh: 阿根廷队再次饮恨点球大战 （智利点球取胜）

translation.en: [Martinez in Spanish] Messi fought really hard. The results didn't go his way.
translation.zh: 梅西真的很努力 结果并不如他所愿

translation.en: How many finals have Argentina lost lately?
translation.zh: 阿根廷最近输了几次决赛？

translation.en: How difficult was it for him?
translation.zh: 这对他来说有多难？

translation.en: [Messi] It's the end for me in the national team.
translation.zh: 我在国家队的日子到头了

translation.en: As I just said, it's been four finals, it's not for me.
translation.zh:
就像我刚才说的 已经四次进决赛了
这不适合我

translation.en: Messi felt that the Argentina team wasn't for him, that's incredible.
translation.zh:
梅西觉得阿根廷队不适合他
这太不可思议了

translation.en: That's what he once said, "It's not for me."
translation.zh:
这是他曾经说过的
“这不适合我”

translation.en: I couldn't make it. I think I'm done.
translation.zh: 我没做到 我想我会退出国家队

translation.en: Is that your final decision?
translation.zh: 这是你最终的决定吗？

translation.en: I think so. I don't know.
translation.zh: 我想是的 我不知道

translation.en: Then he tried again.
translation.zh: 然后他又尝试了

translation.en: And again. And again.
translation.zh: 一次又一次

translation.en: [commentator in English] Pavard… Oh, how about that!
translation.zh: 帕瓦尔…怎么样！

translation.en: Mbappé… He's got another one!
translation.zh: 姆巴佩…他又进了一球！

translation.en: Messi's out of the World Cup.
translation.zh: 梅西无缘世界杯

translation.en: [in Spanish] There's no doubt Messi is not the same as he was in his first World Cup.
translation.zh:
毫无疑问 梅西已经和他第一次
参加世界杯时不一样了

translation.en: His manner of leadership has changed.
translation.zh: 他的领导方式变了

translation.en: That's why we'll go out to the pitch, raise the cup,
translation.zh:
这就是为什么我们要去球场
举起奖杯

translation.en: and take it to Argentina to enjoy it with family and friends…
translation.zh:
把它带回阿根廷
给家人朋友一起看看…

translation.en: There was a turning point in his relationship with the fans
translation.zh: 显然在阿根廷赢得美洲杯之后

translation.en: after the Copa América that Argentina won, obviously.
translation.zh: 他与球迷的关系出现了转折点

translation.en: [commentator in English] Lionel Messi finally has a title with his country.
translation.zh: （2021年美洲杯冠军） 梅西终于为他的国家赢得了一个冠军

translation.en: [Fàbregas] It's Leo's last chance
translation.zh:
这是莱奥最后的机会 我相信阿根廷
有一些特别的东西围绕着他们

translation.en: and I believe that Argentina has something special surrounding them.
translation.zh:
我相信阿根廷
有一些特别的东西围绕着他们

translation.en: [in Spanish] When Messi made his debut in the national team,
translation.zh: 当梅西在国家队首次亮相时

translation.en: this new generation, today's players, were six, eight, ten years old.
translation.zh:
新一代的球员 今天的球员们
当时只有六岁、八岁、十岁

translation.en: So when they were kids and dreamed of being footballers,
translation.zh:
所以当他们还是孩子
梦想成为足球运动员的时候

translation.en: they saw Messi as a role model.
translation.zh: 他们视梅西为榜样

translation.en: [Allister] As his teammates,
translation.zh: 作为队友

translation.en: we see that both on and off the pitch, he is happy, he feels good,
translation.zh:
我们看到无论是在场上还是场下
他都很开心 他感觉很好

translation.en: and that is very important to us.
translation.zh: 这对我们来说非常重要

translation.en: They want Messi to be champion more than they want it for themselves.
translation.zh:
他们更希望梅西 而不是他们自己
成为冠军

translation.en: We are up against great players who know exactly what they're doing.
translation.zh:
我们面对的是伟大的球员
他们知道自己在做什么

translation.en: [producer in English] How are you doing? Comfortable?
translation.zh: 你在那边怎么样？舒服吗？

translation.en: Sí. Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的 对

translation.en: [Ronaldo in Portuguese] If you asked me, if I finished my career today,
translation.zh:
如果你问我
如果我今天结束我的职业生涯

translation.en: would I be happy?
translation.zh: 我会开心吗？

translation.en: Yes, of course!
translation.zh: 当然会！

translation.en: [commentator] Ronaldo!
translation.zh: 罗纳尔多！

translation.en: But a World Cup win would be fun.
translation.zh:
（葡萄牙队长
克里斯蒂亚诺·罗纳尔多） 但是赢得世界杯会很有趣

translation.en: I don't chase records.
translation.zh: 我不追求破记录

translation.en: Records chase me.
translation.zh: 老天爷追着我让我破记录

translation.en: Pressure?
translation.zh: 压力？

translation.en: Every player here feels pressure.
translation.zh: 这里的每位球员都有压力

translation.en: [commentator] Ronaldo!
translation.zh: 罗纳尔多！

translation.en: There's always been pressure ever since I left Madeira, aged 11.
translation.zh:
自从我11岁离开马德拉后
就一直感觉到压力

translation.en: [in English] You get to the final.
translation.zh: 你们踢进了决赛

translation.en: Portugal v. Argentina.
translation.zh: 葡萄牙对阵阿根廷

translation.en: You score two, Messi scores two.
translation.zh: 你进两球 梅西也进两球

translation.en: The last minute you score a third for your hat-trick
translation.zh: 你进两球 梅西也进两球 最后一分钟你帽子戏法进了第三球

translation.en: and you win the World Cup.
translation.zh: 你赢得世界杯

translation.en: Is that… Be honest…
translation.zh: 那是…老实说…

translation.en: -It's too good, come on. -…is that the dream?
translation.zh:
-那就太棒了 拜托
-…那是你的梦想吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I'd retire. 100%.
translation.zh: 对 那我就可以退役了 百分之百

translation.en: [Ronaldo in Portuguese] The goals will come naturally, as usual.
translation.zh: 像以往一样 进球会自然而然地发生

translation.en: Dreaming is something I have always enjoyed.
translation.zh: 我一直很享受拥有梦想

translation.en: Everybody wants to win, but there can only be one winner.
translation.zh: 每个人都想赢 但冠军只能有一个

translation.en: [commentator in English] The stage is well and truly set.
translation.zh: 舞台已经准备好了

translation.en: [fans] Messi!
translation.zh: 梅西！

translation.en: [commentator] This tournament has given such joy to the country of Argentina at times.
translation.zh:
这项赛事给阿根廷
带来了如此多的欢乐

translation.en: [fans] Messi!
translation.zh: 梅西！

translation.en: [commentator] This trophy has not been theirs
translation.zh: 自马拉多纳在墨西哥高举奖杯后

translation.en: since it was lifted high by Maradona in Mexico.
translation.zh: 他们就再也没有赢得过大力神杯

translation.en: Most eyes will be on Argentina's number 10, Lionel Messi.
translation.zh:
大多数人的目光将集中在阿根廷的
10号球员莱昂内尔·梅西身上

translation.en: A real sense of expectation inside the stadium this evening.
translation.zh: （葡萄牙对加纳） 今晚体育场里充满了期待

translation.en: Away we go then.
translation.zh: 那我们开始比赛吧

translation.en: It's a snappy turn and it's Messi!
translation.zh: 一个漂亮的转身 是梅西！

translation.en: Argentina knocking on the door within the first couple of minutes.
translation.zh: 阿根廷在开场几分钟内就险些破门

translation.en: [player] Yes, yes!
translation.zh: 对！

translation.en: [commentator 2] Ghana lose out, and a great chance here for Cristiano Ronaldo!
translation.zh: 加纳失误 这是C罗的大好机会

translation.en: [commentator 1] There is an issue which has halted play here.
translation.zh: 比赛因故暂停了

translation.en: What's the decision?
translation.zh: 裁决是什么？

translation.en: [commentator 3 in Spanish] What's the decision?
translation.zh: 裁判的判决是什么？

translation.en: [commentator 1 in English] It is penalty!
translation.zh: 点球！

translation.en: [commentator 3 in Spanish] Penalty for Argentina!
translation.zh: 阿根廷罚球！

translation.en: [commentator 1 in English] Argentina, handed an opportunity to grab an early lead.
translation.zh: 阿根廷队获得了早早取得领先的机会

translation.en: [commentator 3 in Spanish] Here comes the captain of Argentina.
translation.zh: 阿根廷队队长罚球

translation.en: Here comes Messi!
translation.zh: 梅西射门！

translation.en: Messi scores!
translation.zh: 球进了！

translation.en: [commentator 1 in English] Lionel Messi, always center stage,
translation.zh: （10分钟 阿根廷1-0沙特） 莱昂内尔·梅西永远是舞台的中心

translation.en: often seen with silverware,
translation.zh: 经常获得各种奖杯

translation.en: but this is the trophy he really wants to win.
translation.zh: 但他真正想要赢得的是大力神杯

translation.en: [commentator 2] Ronaldo…
translation.zh: 罗纳尔多…

translation.en: [commentator 1] That is the end of the first 45 minutes.
translation.zh: 前45分钟到此结束

translation.en: [commentator 2] The look on his face tells you all you need to know
translation.zh: 他脸上的表情告诉了你

translation.en: about Portugal's first half.
translation.zh: 葡萄牙上半场的表现如何

translation.en: [commentator 1] It's Argentina who have the lead by a goal to nil.
translation.zh: 阿根廷队一比零领先

translation.en: What are we doing here?
translation.zh: 我们现在在干什么？

translation.en: Messi, at the middle of the pitch.
translation.zh: 梅西 在场中央

translation.en: He has the ball, you stay in front of the defense.
translation.zh: 他拿球 你们要上前防守

translation.en: Take your phone, you can make a picture with him!
translation.zh: 带着手机吧 你们可以和他合影！

translation.en: You are in front of the defense!
translation.zh: 你们要上前防守！

translation.en: You have nobody, he's got it, you follow!
translation.zh: 你周围没有人 他拿球 你就跟上！

translation.en: [in Arabic] You're in front of the defense! Follow and block him!
translation.zh: 上前防守！跟着他 挡住他！

translation.en: [in English] Come on, this is the World Cup!
translation.zh: 拜托 这是世界杯！

translation.en: You don't feel we are able to come back? You don't feel it?
translation.zh:
你们觉得我们扳不回比分吗？
你们觉得做不到吗？

translation.en: Give everything!
translation.zh: 拿出全力来！

translation.en: Be like this! Concentrate!
translation.zh: 就像这样！坚持下去！

translation.en: [in Arabic] Stay ready! Come on!
translation.zh: 做好准备！加油！

translation.en: [commentator 1 in English] Well, Saudi Arabia are collecting their thoughts
translation.zh: 在重回球场之前

translation.en: ahead of coming back out to the pitch
translation.zh: 沙特阿拉伯队正在重新振作

translation.en: and looking to try and do a job in the second half.
translation.zh: 希望能在下半场有所作为

translation.en: They have managed to get a goal on the board
translation.zh: 多亏了他们的主教练

translation.en: thanks to their main man.
translation.zh: 他们燃起了打进一球的斗志

translation.en: Argentina ahead, but not entirely comfortable.
translation.zh: 阿根廷领先 但踢得并不舒服

translation.en: [commentator 2] Saudi Arabia are throwing bodies in the way, working so hard.
translation.zh: 沙特阿拉伯队球员奋力阻截梅西

translation.en: [commentator 1] Messi.
translation.zh: 梅西

translation.en: [commentator 2] Giving it away because of the pressure.
translation.zh: 受迫丢掉了球权

translation.en: [commentator 3 in Arabic] An opportunity to score! This is it!
translation.zh: 进球的机会来了！球进了！

translation.en: Goal!
translation.zh: 球进了！

translation.en: [commentator 1 in English] A blockbuster start to the second half for Saudi Arabia!
translation.zh: 沙特阿拉伯下半场开局不俗！ （48分钟 阿根廷1-1沙特）

translation.en: The slender Argentina lead evaporates in an instant.
translation.zh: 阿根廷微弱的领先优势瞬间消失

translation.en: [commentator] Little flick from João Félix.
translation.zh: 若奥·菲利克斯将球轻轻地一弹

translation.en: Penalty!
translation.zh: 点球！

translation.en: Ronaldo, who will create World Cup history if he scores
translation.zh:
如果罗纳尔多进了这球
他将会创造世界杯历史

translation.en: by becoming the first man to score at five FIFA World Cups.
translation.zh: 成为第一个在五届世界杯上进球的人

translation.en: -It's 1-0 Portugal… -[commentator 2] Goal!
translation.zh:
-葡萄牙队1比0…
-进球了！ （葡萄牙1-0加纳）

translation.en: [commentator 1] …and it's a moment of World Cup history.
translation.zh: …这是世界杯历史上的一刻

translation.en: [commentator 2 in Portuguese] The father of Portugal!
translation.zh: 葡萄牙之父！

translation.en: [commentator 1 in English] Messi goes down and belatedly a free-kick is given Argentina's way.
translation.zh:
梅西倒在地上 阿根廷得到了
一个姗姗来迟的任意球

translation.en: You feel the tension here.
translation.zh: 你能感受到此刻的紧张气氛

translation.en: Lionel Messi has the focus.
translation.zh: 莱昂内尔·梅西是焦点

translation.en: It is Messi…
translation.zh: 梅西…

translation.en: And it's over, and considerably so.
translation.zh: 比赛可以说结束了

translation.en: Kudus to pull it back across… Ayew!
translation.zh: 库德斯将球拉回传中…阿尤！

translation.en: Ghana are back level! André Ayew with the equalizer!
translation.zh: 加纳扳平了！安德雷·阿尤扳平了！

translation.en: They weren't behind for long.
translation.zh: 他们没有落后多久

translation.en: Fernandes…
translation.zh: 费尔南德斯…

translation.en: He's played it through. Chance for Portugal…
translation.zh: 他传出直塞球 葡萄牙的机会来了…

translation.en: 2-1 Portugal.
translation.zh: 葡萄牙2比1

translation.en: And the strike is decent.
translation.zh: 射门打得很精彩

translation.en: [commentator 2 in Arabic] Saudi Arabia are still pressing! Shot!
translation.zh: 沙特阿拉伯还在进攻！射门！ 我的天！

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 我的天！

translation.en: Impossible…
translation.zh: 不可能…

translation.en: Nothing is impossible for Saudi Arabia!
translation.zh:
对沙特阿拉伯来说
没有什么不可能！

translation.en: Yes! Against Argentina!
translation.zh: 是的！对阿根廷！

translation.en: [commentator 1 in English] He's got options here.
translation.zh: 他左边和右边都有选择

translation.en: [commentator 2 in Portuguese] Portuguese attack…
translation.zh: 葡萄牙进攻…

translation.en: Goal for Leão!
translation.zh: （80分钟 葡萄牙3-1加纳） 莱昂进球！

translation.en: [commentator 1 in English] It's victory for Portugal,
translation.zh: （终场 葡萄牙3-2加纳） 葡萄牙胜利了 下半场共有五粒进球

translation.en: five goals in the second half.
translation.zh: 葡萄牙胜利了 下半场共有五粒进球

translation.en: Cristiano Ronaldo's penalty started it all off.
translation.zh: C罗的点球拉开了进球的序幕

translation.en: [commentator 2 in Arabic] They've rewritten history!
translation.zh: 他们书写了历史！

translation.en: Here from Lusail Stadium! Yes! You've made history!
translation.zh:
这里是卢塞尔体育场！
是的！你们创造了历史！

translation.en: [commentator 3 in Spanish] Shocking! Shocking result!
translation.zh: 震惊！令人震惊的结果！

translation.en: [commentator 1 in English] The FIFA World Cup 2022 has its first
translation.zh:
2022年国际足联世界杯
迎来了第一个… （C组-已赛-积分）

translation.en: jaw-dropping, eye-catching shock result.
translation.zh:
（沙特 一战三分
阿根廷 一战零分） …令人瞠目结舌
引人注目的震撼比分

translation.en: [journalist in Portuguese] This week a photo was published by Louis Vuitton
translation.zh: 这个礼拜 路易威登发布了一张

translation.en: of you and Messi, a photo that symbolizes intelligence
translation.zh: 你跟梅西的合影 一张象征智慧

translation.en: and time passing by.
translation.zh: 和时间流逝的照片

translation.en: Messi recently stated that this would be his last World Cup.
translation.zh:
梅西最近表示
这将是他最后一次参加世界杯

translation.en: I ask you, is this your last World Cup?
translation.zh: 请问 这是你的最后一届世界杯吗？

translation.en: And who will checkmate whom?
translation.zh: 谁会将谁的军？

translation.en: Checkmate?
translation.zh: 将军？

translation.en: You checkmate in life, not only in chess.
translation.zh:
不只是在国际象棋中
在生活中也要将军对手

translation.en: You can checkmate in life,
translation.zh: 在生活中也可以将军

translation.en: I often checkmate.
translation.zh: 我经常将军对手

translation.en: I want to be the one to checkmate him.
translation.zh: 我想要将他的军

translation.en: [Laurens in English] Argentina, losing to Saudi Arabia,
translation.zh: 阿根廷输给了沙特阿拉伯

translation.en: one of the biggest upsets in the history of the World Cup,
translation.zh: 这是世界杯历史上 足球比赛史上

translation.en: in the history of football.
translation.zh: 最大的冷门之一

translation.en: Each team have got different ambitions and objectives
translation.zh: 各支球队根据自身强弱

translation.en: depending if you are a big or a small country.
translation.zh: 都有不同的抱负和目标

translation.en: Here we go, guys.
translation.zh: 好了 各位

translation.en: Showtime, guys. You ready?
translation.zh: 表演时间到 各位 准备好了吗？

translation.en: [Laurens] There's a feeling that everybody is behind you.
translation.zh: 有一种所有人都支持你的感觉

translation.en: You play for the people back home who want you to win.
translation.zh: 你为国内的球迷们而战

translation.en: [woman] Sir, you have the US Men's National Soccer Team.
translation.zh:
总统先生
美国男子国家足球队的电话已接通

translation.en: Coach, put me in, I'm ready to play.
translation.zh: 教练 让我上场 我准备好踢球了

translation.en: Tell you what, you've got some of the best players in the world on your team
translation.zh:
跟你说 你们的球队
有世界上最好的球员

translation.en: and you're representing this country
translation.zh: 你们代表着这个国家

translation.en: and I know you're gonna play your hearts out, so let's go shock 'em all.
translation.zh:
我知道你们会全力以赴
所以让我们去震惊他们吧

translation.en: Keep trusting in one another,
translation.zh: 继续信任彼此

translation.en: play as hard as you can, and the whole country's rooting for you.
translation.zh:
尽你们所能努力比赛
整个国家都会为你们加油

translation.en: That's a very nice message, Mr. President. The whole team is here.
translation.zh:
这是一个非常好的信息
总统先生 整个团队都在这里

translation.en: We really appreciate your support and we're ready to go.
translation.zh:
我们非常感谢您的支持
我们已经准备好了

translation.en: I really wish I were there to see you.
translation.zh: 我真希望能在现场看到你们

translation.en: Go get 'em, guys, just play your hearts out.
translation.zh: 去吧 伙计们 尽你们的全力

translation.en: -We've got this. -I know you will.
translation.zh:
-我们会的
-我知道你们会

translation.en: Our mission is to change the way the world views American soccer.
translation.zh:
我们的使命是
改变世界对美国足球的看法

translation.en: US soccer, in general, has always been perceived that we're kind of pushovers.
translation.zh: 总的来说 美国队一直被视为弱旅

translation.en: ♪ O say can you see… ♪
translation.zh: （1994年世界杯 美国主办）

translation.en: [Adams] In the past, we had not too many players that were playing in Europe.
translation.zh:
在过去 我们没有太多的球员
在欧洲踢球

translation.en: Now a lot of guys are playing Champions League,
translation.zh: 现在很多人都在踢欧冠

translation.en: at some of the best clubs around the world.
translation.zh: 在一些世界上最好的俱乐部里踢球

translation.en: [commentator] Here is Christian Pulisic. Scores it well.
translation.zh: 克里斯蒂安·普里希奇 得分

translation.en: USA!
translation.zh: 美国队！

translation.en: We have a lot of confidence, youth, and agility.
translation.zh: 我们很有信心、年轻、敏捷

translation.en: [commentator] And it's Weah!
translation.zh: 是维阿！

translation.en: [chanting] USA! USA!
translation.zh: 美国！

translation.en: Come on!
translation.zh: 加油！

translation.en: [Adams] Our first game of the World Cup is against Wales.
translation.zh:
我们世界杯的第一场比赛
是对阵威尔士队

translation.en: It's tough.
translation.zh: 很艰难

translation.en: When you face Gareth Bale, where do you begin?
translation.zh:
当你面对加雷斯·贝尔时
你从哪里下手？

translation.en: You know, what a career.
translation.zh: 他的足球生涯太了不起了

translation.en: He plays for something even more than just himself or for his club.
translation.zh:
他踢球不仅仅是为了他自己
或者他的俱乐部

translation.en: [producer] You've had a stellar career.
translation.zh: 你的职业生涯很辉煌 （威尔士队长 贝尔）

translation.en: -You've won four Champions Leagues? -Five.
translation.zh:
-你赢得过四次欧冠冠军？
-五次

translation.en: [commentator] It's the spectacular, it's Gareth Bale!
translation.zh: 真精彩 是加雷斯·贝尔！

translation.en: [in Portuguese] I thought, "Man, this guy is a phenomenon."
translation.zh: 我心想：“天啊 这家伙真厉害”

translation.en: [commentator in English] Bale, eyes it up, lines it up.
translation.zh: 贝尔 全神贯注 准备就位 （威尔士对乌克兰）

translation.en: Big players turn up for big games, and he falls into that category.
translation.zh:
明星球员会在重要比赛中发挥作用
而他就属于这一类球员

translation.en: [commentator] The dragon has roared! Wales are going to the World Cup!
translation.zh: 巨龙之吼！威尔士要去世界杯了！

translation.en: I wouldn't say I've completely neglected my clubs.
translation.zh: 我不会说我完全忽略了我的俱乐部

translation.en: The proudest thing you can do as an athlete,
translation.zh:
作为一名运动员
一个足球运动员 你能做的

translation.en: never mind a footballer, is to represent your country.
translation.zh: 最骄傲的事就是代表你的国家

translation.en: [commentator] Qatar, here they come!
translation.zh: 卡塔尔 他们来了！

translation.en: The thing with Bale is, he started very young,
translation.zh:
贝尔很年轻就开始踢球
他踢了很多比赛

translation.en: he played lots of games.
translation.zh: （西班牙传奇 法布雷加斯）

translation.en: It's tough because he's had also a lot of injuries.
translation.zh: 那很艰难 因为他也有很多伤病

translation.en: -[Bale groans] -And again, lift.
translation.zh: 再抬起来

translation.en: This is likely to be a last hurrah.
translation.zh:
这很可能是最后的欢呼 （英格兰传奇
莱因克尔）

translation.en: We know he's been past his best for a few years now.
translation.zh:
我们知道他的最佳状态
已经过去好几年了

translation.en: But has he got anything left in him?
translation.zh: 但他还宝刀未老吗？

translation.en: [producer] It looks like his fingers are inside your body.
translation.zh: 看起来他的手像是伸进了你的身体里

translation.en: Well they're not 'cause they're outside my body.
translation.zh: 其实不是的 因为它们在我身体外面

translation.en: If they were inside I'd be very worried.
translation.zh: 要是在身体里 我会非常担心

translation.en: -[producer] It looks deep inside. -I don't think you can do that in Qatar.
translation.zh:
-看上去像是伸进去很深
-我觉得在卡塔尔你不能这样做

translation.en: To be playing for Wales and taking them to the World Cup,
translation.zh: 为威尔士效力 带他们去参加世界杯

translation.en: for it to become a reality is surreal.
translation.zh: 让一切变成现实 这很不真实

translation.en: It's not a good sight, that one, for me. It really isn't a good sight.
translation.zh:
对我来说 这画面不好看
这画面真的不好看

translation.en: It's not too bad.
translation.zh: 不是太糟糕

translation.en: [Bale] Whenever I meet up with Wales, it just feels like home.
translation.zh:
每当我和威尔士队员见面时
就像是回家了一样

translation.en: The players, we've grown up together and played with each other a long time.
translation.zh: 球员们一起成长 一起踢了很久的球

translation.en: I know everybody sees I'm quite quiet,
translation.zh: 我知道人人都觉得我很安静

translation.en: but I like to joke around and get people going.
translation.zh: 但我喜欢开玩笑 捉弄别人

translation.en: Man, that hurt. Like, you done that too hard.
translation.zh: 伙计 那很疼 你拍得太用力了

translation.en: [Bale] It's about us as a team trying to do as best as we can.
translation.zh:
关键是作为一个团队
要尽我们所能做到最好

translation.en: I don't get it.
translation.zh: 我不明白

translation.en: It's been 64 years since we've qualified for a World Cup, since 1958.
translation.zh:
自1958年以来
我们已经有64年没有参加世界杯了

translation.en: My generation, even my parents' generation.
translation.zh: 我这一代 甚至我父母那一代

translation.en: We've never had our team playing there.
translation.zh: 我们的球队从没进过决赛圈

translation.en: [Jones] To put that Welsh shirt on for me
translation.zh:
（1954-1969
威尔士中场 克里夫·琼斯） 穿上那件威尔士球衣

translation.en: was one of the big honors of my footballing career.
translation.zh: 是我足球生涯最大的荣誉之一

translation.en: [Bale] Cliff Jones, I've met him a lot of times.
translation.zh: 克里夫·琼斯 我见过他很多次

translation.en: He's a role model.
translation.zh: 他是一个榜样

translation.en: Cliff, you okay?
translation.zh: 克里夫 你还好吗？

translation.en: Gareth, how are you, son?
translation.zh: 加雷斯 你好吗 孩子？

translation.en: One big difference between me and Gareth Bale…
translation.zh: 我和加雷斯·贝尔最大的不同是…

translation.en: -How are you? -I'm good, you?
translation.zh:
-你好吗？
-我很好 你呢？

translation.en: I think I'm better-looking.
translation.zh: 我觉得我更帅

translation.en: [commentator] Wales, driving forward.
translation.zh: 威尔士 向前进攻

translation.en: Oh, what a goal!
translation.zh: 精彩的进球！

translation.en: The crowd are delighted!
translation.zh: 观众们很高兴！

translation.en: We got to the quarter-finals and played Brazil.
translation.zh:
我们踢进了四分之一决赛
对阵巴西队

translation.en: [Jones] Nobody had heard about Pelé.
translation.zh: 没人听说过贝利

translation.en: "Who's this kid, 17 years of age?"
translation.zh: “这个17岁的孩子是谁？”

translation.en: [Bale] Pelé had scored the winner.
translation.zh: 贝利踢进了制胜球

translation.en: [commentator] And the ball falls to Pelé! And he scores!
translation.zh: 球落到了贝利脚下！他进球了！

translation.en: [Jones] To represent Wales in the World Cup,
translation.zh: 代表威尔士参加世界杯

translation.en: doesn't get much better than that.
translation.zh: 没有比这更好的了

translation.en: [Bale] Hopefully we can go as far as them, if not further.
translation.zh:
如果没法超越的话
希望我们能走得和他们一样远

translation.en: [man] We've had so many near misses, so many disappointments.
translation.zh: 我们有太多次功亏一篑 太多次失望

translation.en: It's one of those things you get, following Wales.
translation.zh:
这就是作为威尔士球迷
你会得到的体验之一

translation.en: [man] We've always had very good players,
translation.zh: 我们一直都有非常优秀的球员

translation.en: but we've found difficulty meshing them into a team.
translation.zh:
但我们发现很难
将他们整合成一个团队

translation.en: [Driscoll] Ian Rush.
translation.zh: 伊恩·拉什

translation.en: Neville Southall.
translation.zh: 内维尔·索夏尔

translation.en: Ryan Giggs.
translation.zh: 瑞恩·吉格斯

translation.en: Mark Hughes.
translation.zh: 马克·休斯

translation.en: Gary Speed.
translation.zh: 加里·斯皮德

translation.en: [Blanche] Wales were in the doldrums when he took over.
translation.zh: 他上任时 威尔士正处于低迷期

translation.en: They were ranked 117th in the world. They couldn't get any lower.
translation.zh:
他们在世界排名第117位
是他们有史以来的最低排名

translation.en: [Bale] Gary Speed came in and really changed the mentality of everybody.
translation.zh:
加里·斯皮德的到来
改变了所有人的心态

translation.en: The face of Wales, of the national team,
translation.zh: 威尔士的代表 国家队的代表

translation.en: not just the football, but the infrastructure
translation.zh: 不仅仅是足球 还有基础设施

translation.en: and that club kind of environment.
translation.zh: 还有那种俱乐部式的环境

translation.en: It is a big task, but I'm just thankful I've got the opportunity
translation.zh:
这是一项艰巨的任务 但我很感激
我有这个机会… （2010-2011
教练 加里·斯皮德）

translation.en: to try and make Wales successful
translation.zh:
（2010-2011
教练 加里·斯皮德） …努力让威尔士获得成功

translation.en: and it's an opportunity I look forward to.
translation.zh: 我很期待这个机会

translation.en: [Bale] Before Speed, it was more we just turned up for Wales.
translation.zh:
在斯皮德到来前 我们更多的是
代表威尔士亮相

translation.en: We played, we didn't do so well and it was kind of just stuck in a rut.
translation.zh:
我们踢球 我们踢得不是很好
就像是被困住了一样

translation.en: [Blanche] Players who hadn't turned up before were suddenly wanting to be part of Wales.
translation.zh:
以前没有出现过的球员
突然想要加入威尔士队

translation.en: It was far more professional.
translation.zh: 那要专业得多

translation.en: He laid the foundations, really, uh, of the success we're seeing today.
translation.zh:
他为我们今天所看到的成功
奠定了基础

translation.en: It's fabulous to see Wales playing in the World Cup.
translation.zh: 看到威尔士队参加世界杯真是太棒了

translation.en: Particular in the recent history of what's happened to them.
translation.zh: 尤其是最近发生在他们身上的事

translation.en: The Welsh football manager Gary Speed has died at the age of 42.
translation.zh:
威尔士国家队教练
加里·斯皮德去世 享年42岁

translation.en: The Football Association of Wales has told the BBC
translation.zh: 威尔士足球协会告诉BBC

translation.en: that it appears he had taken his own life.
translation.zh: 他似乎死于自杀

translation.en: The next time I sent him a message, was yesterday morning.
translation.zh: 接下来我给他发信息 是昨天早上

translation.en: It said, "Sick rumor doing the rounds, mate, please give me a call."
translation.zh:
我说：“到处都是不好的谣言 伙计
请给我打个电话”

translation.en: There was no call.
translation.zh: 可他没回我的电话

translation.en: Oh, Bryn.
translation.zh: 布莱恩

translation.en: [Bale] We still speak about him to this day.
translation.zh: 我们到今天还会聊起他

translation.en: Everyone involved will tell you how grateful the whole nation is.
translation.zh:
所有相关人士都会告诉你
全国人民有多感激

translation.en: If he didn't come in at that moment, we might not be where we are now.
translation.zh:
如果当时没有他
我们就不会有现在的成绩

translation.en: We might not have had that foundation
translation.zh: 我们可能没有这样的基础

translation.en: to achieve what we've achieved.
translation.zh: 来实现我们已经取得的成就

translation.en: [Lineker] If he's watching somewhere,
translation.zh: 如果他现在在某处看着

translation.en: I think he'd be proud of what's happened.
translation.zh: 我想他会为一切感到自豪

translation.en: Obviously it's fantastic this morning
translation.zh: 很明显 今天早上非常棒

translation.en: that we have one of the great Welsh actors,
translation.zh: 我们请来了一位伟大的威尔士演员

translation.en: More than Welsh, British, international actors.
translation.zh:
不仅仅是威尔士、英国演员
更是国际演员

translation.en: Who's the actor?
translation.zh: 那位演员是谁？

translation.en: Michael Sheen.
translation.zh: 迈克尔·辛

translation.en: Oh, wow.
translation.zh: 哇噢

translation.en: You can't do better than that, can you?
translation.zh: 没法更好了 是吧？

translation.en: I mean, play that before every game.
translation.zh: 每场比赛前都要这样

translation.en: Speech.
translation.zh: 讲两句吧

translation.en: I'll try and give you something to take with you.
translation.zh: 我会努力给你们留下好印象

translation.en: Okay… [groans]
translation.zh: 好吧…

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [commentator] Wales return to the World Cup after a 64-year absence.
translation.zh: 威尔士在缺席64年后重返世界杯

translation.en: [in Welsh] Still here!
translation.zh: 还在这里！

translation.en: [in English] I hear the voices singing.
translation.zh: 我听到歌声

translation.en: Speed your journey, boys.
translation.zh: 加快你们的旅程吧 小子们

translation.en: [Bale] I've been thinking about this moment and preparing for this moment.
translation.zh:
我一直在想着这一刻
为这一刻做准备

translation.en: To lead your country out for the first time in 64 years…
translation.zh:
带领自己的国家
64年来第一次打进决赛圈…

translation.en: Come on, Wales!
translation.zh: 加油 威尔士！

translation.en: [Sheen in Welsh] Still here.
translation.zh: 还在这里

translation.en: Still here!
translation.zh: 还在这里！

translation.en: [Sheen in English] A red storm is coming!
translation.zh: 红色风暴来袭！

translation.en: [Bale] …it just means that a little more.
translation.zh: …它的意义就是要更深远一些

translation.en: You were born it. You were raised it.
translation.zh: 它与生俱来 伴随你成长

translation.en: It's in your blood.
translation.zh: 流淌在你的血液里

translation.en: [crowd in Welsh] ♪ We are still here! ♪
translation.zh: 我们还在这里！

translation.en: [commentator in English] Wales are back after 64 years,
translation.zh:
（2022年世界杯 B组
美国对威尔士） 威尔士在64年后回归

translation.en: the longest gap between qualifications in World Cup history.
translation.zh:
这是世界杯历史上两次打进决赛圈
间隔时间最长的一支球队

translation.en: Come on!
translation.zh: 拜托！

translation.en: They're not actually that good, are they?
translation.zh: 他们其实没那么好 对吧？

translation.en: [fans chanting] USA! USA! USA!
translation.zh: 美国队！

translation.en: [commentator] Weah is in behind Neco Williams, plays it into the middle!
translation.zh:
维阿突破了尼克·威廉姆斯
把球传到中路！

translation.en: It's almost an own-goal by Rodon!
translation.zh: 罗登差点踢了乌龙球！

translation.en: Hennessey didn't know much about it, but he got his body in behind it.
translation.zh:
亨尼西还没完全反应过来
但下意识将球挡出

translation.en: Danger not passed yet.
translation.zh: 危险还没有过去

translation.en: Sargent!
translation.zh: 萨金特！

translation.en: Very hairy moments there for Wales.
translation.zh: 这对威尔士来说是非常危险的时刻

translation.en: [Bale] We were in complete control. One of the better halves we've played.
translation.zh:
我们完全控制了局面
这是我们踢得最好的半场之一

translation.en: Our performance was dominant.
translation.zh: 我们占据了优势

translation.en: [commentator] Really seeing very little of Gareth Bale up front so far for Wales.
translation.zh:
到目前为止 在威尔士锋线上
很少看到贝尔的身影

translation.en: Musah. Bale.
translation.zh: 穆萨、贝尔

translation.en: And the Wales captain is in the book for protesting.
translation.zh: 威尔士队长因不服裁判被判犯规

translation.en: Come on, Bale, fucking hell. Switch on, mate.
translation.zh:
拜托 贝尔 去他的
好好踢吧 伙计

translation.en: [commentator] Hennessey's clearance. He's looking for Bale.
translation.zh: 亨尼西开大脚 寻找贝尔

translation.en: Ream was right there with him.
translation.zh: 利姆对其贴身防守

translation.en: If you're a USA fan, you must be feeling rather optimistic.
translation.zh:
如果你是美国队的球迷
你一定会觉得很乐观

translation.en: [fans chanting] USA! USA!
translation.zh: 美国队！

translation.en: [commentator] Pulisic… Plays it through. It's Weah!
translation.zh: 普利西奇…直传 是维阿！

translation.en: And Weah scores for the USA!
translation.zh: 维阿为美国队打进一球！

translation.en: And it's been coming, you have to say.
translation.zh: 你不得不说 这球终于进了

translation.en: Wales have it all to do now.
translation.zh: （36分钟 美国1-0威尔士） 威尔士现在有很多事情要做

translation.en: It's been an excellent first half for the United States of America.
translation.zh: 美国队上半场表现很精彩

translation.en: Frankly, they've been cut apart so often
translation.zh: 老实说 他们开场45分钟… （中场 美国1-0威尔士）

translation.en: in that opening 45 minutes.
translation.zh: （中场 美国1-0威尔士） …防守很薄弱

translation.en: [fans] USA!
translation.zh: 美国队！

translation.en: [Adams] I honestly don't recall Wales even being in our half of the field.
translation.zh:
老实说 我甚至不记得
威尔士攻到过我们的半场

translation.en: We dominated. We came in at half time and we said,
translation.zh:
我们主导了比赛
到了中场时间 我们说到

translation.en: "If we can get another 45-minute performance like that,
translation.zh:
“要是我们在接下来的45分钟
继续这么踢

translation.en: we win the game."
translation.zh: 我们就能赢得比赛”

translation.en: Serge. Be smart. But everyone else get [bleep] stuck in.
translation.zh:
塞尔日 聪明点
但其他人都…被压住了

translation.en: -Bale's looking cut off. -[indistinct chatter]
translation.zh: 给贝尔的传球都被切断了

translation.en: [Berhalter] Forty-five minutes, we see it out. Let's go!
translation.zh:
45分钟 我们要继续踢好下半场
上场吧！

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.zh: 上场吧！

translation.en: [Sheen] A song of hope.
translation.zh: 希望之歌

translation.en: A song of defiance.
translation.zh: 反抗之歌

translation.en: A victory song!
translation.zh: 胜利之歌！

translation.en: [Bale] Probably one of the most difficult things is to play a game
translation.zh:
当你受了轻伤时
也许最困难的事情之一

translation.en: when you have a slight injury.
translation.zh: 就是踢比赛

translation.en: I know the risks.
translation.zh: 我知道风险

translation.en: But if there's a chance you can affect the game then it's worth taking that risk.
translation.zh:
但如果你有机会影响比赛
那就值得冒这个险

translation.en: The pages of the history books, waiting to be written.
translation.zh: 历史书的书页 等待着被书写

translation.en: Open to you right there.
translation.zh: 就在你们面前打开

translation.en: [Bale] So we keep fighting till the end.
translation.zh: 所以我们要一直战斗到最后

translation.en: They don't know what's coming.
translation.zh: 他们不知道接下来会发生什么

translation.en: [commentator] Up in the air from Tyler Adams.
translation.zh: 泰勒·亚当斯头球

translation.en: Header towards goal! And it's pushed over by Turner!
translation.zh: 头球攻门！球被特纳扑出！

translation.en: -[man] What a save! -[woman] Wow.
translation.zh:
-救得好！
-哇噢

translation.en: Good start! Well done!
translation.zh: 好的开场！干得好！

translation.en: Come on! Come on!
translation.zh: 加油！

translation.en: [Adams] When you see your star player running and battling like that,
translation.zh:
当你看到你的明星球员
在那样奔跑战斗

translation.en: it sends a message to every player on that field.
translation.zh:
那会给场上的每一位球员
传递一个信息

translation.en: I think he set the standard and set the expectation
translation.zh: 我认为他设定了标准和期望

translation.en: for the rest of his team to just continue battling.
translation.zh: 让他的队友继续战斗

translation.en: [mouthing] Just keep breathing.
translation.zh: 继续保持呼吸

translation.en: I know you're tired, but you just gotta do it.
translation.zh: 我知道你累了 但你必须这么做

translation.en: [Sheen] They'll always say we're too small…
translation.zh: 他们总是说我们太渺小…

translation.en: [commentator] Headed over the top!
translation.zh: 头球高出！

translation.en: [Sheen] …too weak…
translation.zh: …太弱…

translation.en: [commentator] So close.
translation.zh: 差一点

translation.en: [Sheen] …too full of fear.
translation.zh: …太恐惧

translation.en: [commentator] Two excellent chances for Wales.
translation.zh: 威尔士两次绝佳的机会

translation.en: Yes, yes!
translation.zh: 对！

translation.en: [Sheen] Sixty-four years, and far from home.
translation.zh: 64年 远离家乡

translation.en: [commentator] Penalty, Wales!
translation.zh: 威尔士 点球！

translation.en: Bale is brought down! It's a penalty to Wales!
translation.zh: 贝尔被铲倒！威尔士获得点球！

translation.en: Close your eyes…
translation.zh: 闭上眼睛…

translation.en: and feel the breath on the back of your necks,
translation.zh: 感受你脖子后面的呼吸

translation.en: because that's every man, woman and child
translation.zh: 因为那是这片古老的土地上的

translation.en: in this old land, standing there with you
translation.zh:
每个男人、女人和孩子
和你站在一起

translation.en: at your back.
translation.zh: 站在你的背后

translation.en: [commentator] All around Wales…
translation.zh: 威尔士各地

translation.en: In the cities and in the valleys,
translation.zh: 在城市和山谷里

translation.en: a nation holds its breath.
translation.zh: 整个国家屏住呼吸

translation.en: [Sheen in Welsh] Still here!
translation.zh: 还在这里！

translation.en: [commentator] Did anyone have any doubt?
translation.zh: 有人有疑问吗？

translation.en: Gareth Bale!
translation.zh: 加雷斯·贝尔！

translation.en: With his most important goal for his country.
translation.zh: 他为他的国家踢进了最重要的一球

translation.en: [coach] These [bleep] don't know who Australian players are.
translation.zh: 这些混蛋不知道澳大利亚球员是谁

translation.en: Go and show these [bleep] who we are!
translation.zh: 让这些混蛋看看我们是谁！

translation.en: -Get out there and get into them! -Come on, let's go!
translation.zh:
-出去迎战这些家伙！
-加油 上场！

translation.en: [reporter] Do you feel that you and the Danish FA can speak out about other issues
translation.zh:
你觉得你和丹麦足协
在谈到这项赛事时

translation.en: when it comes to this tournament?
translation.zh: 能就其他问题发表意见吗？

translation.en: [in Danish] My job is playing football.
translation.zh: 我的工作是踢足球

translation.en: I'm not good with politics.
translation.zh: 我不擅长搞政治

translation.en: Where is Messi?
translation.zh: 梅西在哪？

translation.en: [Messi in Spanish] There are moments of tension, of friction.
translation.zh: 有紧张、冲突的时刻

translation.en: [commentator in English] This is a mind game to end them all.
translation.zh: 这是一场心智的较量

translation.en: The story of the tournament is being written here!
translation.zh: 这项赛事的故事正在这里被书写！

translation.en: Oh, it's in! Remarkable!
translation.zh: 球进了！太精彩了！

translation.en: [in Portuguese] Talk about the competition. Stop asking questions about me.
translation.zh: 谈谈比赛吧 别再问关于我的问题了

translation.en: -[in French] It's for Netflix? -Yep.
translation.zh:
-是网飞的节目吗？
-是的

translation.en: I'm going to be on Netflix?
translation.zh: 我要出现在网飞上了？

translation.en: Yes, you'll be on Netflix.
translation.zh: 对 你会出现在网飞上

translation.en: No, you should have told me! I'd have dressed better.
translation.zh:
不 你应该告诉我的！
我会穿得更帅气点
